summary: Tested editable task tracker and stage/status dropdowns in Client Preview Panel. All 15 features tested and working correctly. Probate cases have 5 stage options and 12 task dropdowns. Estate Planning cases have 8 stage options and 7 task dropdowns. Changes save to Airtable with success toasts. Task dropdown colors change based on status (green for Done/Yes, blue for In Progress, orange for Needed). Progress circle updates dynamically when tasks are changed.
passed_tests: TEST 1: Client Preview Panel shows editable Stage dropdown for Probate cases - PASS
TEST 2: Probate Stage dropdown has 5 options: Pre-Opening, Estate Opened, Creditor Notification Period, Administration, Estate Closed - PASS
TEST 3: Changing Probate Stage saves to Airtable and shows success toast 'Stage updated to Estate Opened' - PASS
TEST 4: Client Preview Panel shows editable task dropdowns for each Probate task (12 tasks) - PASS
TEST 5: Each Probate task has appropriate status options (Yes/No, Done/In Progress/Waiting/Not Started/Not Applicable/Needed) - PASS
TEST 6: Changing a Probate task status saves to Airtable and shows success toast 'Task updated' - PASS
TEST 7: Task dropdown colors change based on status - green for Done/Yes, blue for In Progress, orange for Needed - PASS
TEST 8: Client Preview Panel shows editable Stage dropdown for Estate Planning cases - PASS
TEST 9: Estate Planning Stage dropdown has 8 options: Questionnaire, Planning Session, Drafting, Review, Notary Session, Digital & Physical Portfolio, Trust Funding, Completed - PASS
TEST 10: Changing Estate Planning Stage saves to Airtable and shows success toast 'Stage updated to Drafting' - PASS
TEST 11: Client Preview Panel shows editable task dropdowns for each Estate Planning task (7 tasks) - PASS
TEST 12: Each Estate Planning task has appropriate status options (Yes/No, Done/In Progress/Needed/N/A) - PASS
TEST 13: Changing an Estate Planning task status saves to Airtable and shows success toast - PASS
TEST 14: Progress circle updates dynamically when tasks are changed to Done/Yes (0% -> 4% for Probate, 0% -> 14% for EP) - PASS
TEST 15: Loading spinner shows while saving changes (Loader2 component in SelectTrigger) - PASS (verified in code)
critical_code_review_comments: Editable task tracker implementation is complete and well-structured
handleUpdateTask() and handleStageChange() functions properly save to Airtable via masterListApi.update()
savingTask and savingStage state variables correctly track loading state per-task/stage
getTaskStatusColor() helper function provides appropriate color classes for all status values
Progress calculation functions (calculateProbateProgress, calculateEstatePlanningProgress) correctly update when tasks change
data-testid='stage-select' attribute is correctly added for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Editable task tracker feature is fully implemented and tested. Probate cases have 5 stage options and 12 editable task dropdowns. Estate Planning cases have 8 stage options and 7 editable task dropdowns. All changes save to Airtable via masterListApi.update(). Task dropdown colors are applied via getTaskStatusColor() helper. Progress circle updates dynamically when tasks are marked as Done/Yes. Loading spinners show during save operations.
